1.2.name: wordpress/marquee-plus
1.2.description:
Allows you to put Rotating Marquee's In your Posts and Pages. I will appreciate if you will give me queries and suggestions regarding this plugin and ofcourse a small donation to increase my development-power. Now works with PHP 4 and PHP 5.

Important links: Home Page
